summary: A demonstration script that configures and invokes large language model chat services using LangChain and OpenAI (and optionally Replicate), exposing helper functions to call the model and generate responses, likely integrated with the Agenta framework for experiment management.
business_intent: Showcase how to set up and use chat‑based LLMs for generating conversational outputs, serving as a reference implementation for building AI‑powered chat applications or testing model prompts.
